Calculate DGE between clones

Source: R/DE.R
calculate_DE.Rd

The function performs DE for specific subclones using the function FindMarkers from Seurat.

calculate_DE(
  x,
  input,
  clone1,
  clone2,
  method = "wilcox",
  normalize = TRUE,
  logfc.threshold = 0.25
)

Arguments

x

Rcongas object with fits

input

a genes by cell couunts matrix. Cell name should match the names used in the Rcongas object

clone1

first clone id as saved in the Rcongas object (ec c1,c2)

clone2

second clone id. If null it performs DE against all the other clones together

method

DE expression method. Supports all the method implemented in FindMarkers

normalize

Normalize gene counts?

logfc.threshold

log fold change threshold for DE

Value

an Rcongas object with a DE field

Examples


x = Rcongas::congas_example

count_mat <- x$data$raw %>% reshape2::acast(gene ~ cell, fill = 0, value.var = "n")
calculate_DE(x,count_mat, "c1", "c2" )
